guardian.title: Keystone pipeline passes House vote as Republicans defy Obama veto threat
guardian.topComment: The first thing the Republicans do when they have a little more power is to push through this boondoggle. Obviously their first priority is to pay back favors to their oil buddies, the Koch brothers and secondly to stick it to Obama, purely out of so...
